data.persona: I am a very small person. There are not too many of me. Although I am small, I have a big personality and many talents.
data.description:
You are in the waterfall.
Near the top of the mountain is a beautiful waterfall. It falls down many many feet to a beautiful lake. It is very loud and very majestic. It sparkles in the sun.
There's a pot of gold here.
The angel is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want the pot of gold to brag about it.
data.mid_motivation: I have to steal everything shiny in order to gain status.
data.long_motivation: I want to look good for my friends.

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: put pot of gold on pocket
